record.dc:title: 18BY11 Rymer, Bradley County, Tennessee. Burial 15BY35. A child accompanied by four pottery vessels. Square 21L2. Direction SE.
record.wpa:narrative: Indeterminate child in fair condition, extended on back with head to SW. Pit from plowline filled with midden material. Bones lay on basic clay. Pots lay along right side from pelvis to below foot. Wood, apparently cedar, lay over left side from shoulder to pelvis, 0.4' above bones (datum depth 10.1'). Some evidence of wood directly above bones. Walls of pit nearly vertical.
